* Contact: EricBrasseur
* Make: HP
* Model: Pavilion dv6415eb
* Website: www.hp.com

=== Current Issues ===

The wireless network controller Broadcom Corporation BCM94311MCG wlan mini-PCI (rev 02) doesn't get to work with the Restricted Drivers dialog in Ubuntu 7.10. I tried the default download and two firmwares from Dell.

No DMA control in Ubuntu 7.04 and 7.10

=== System Info ===

Intel dual core CPU T2130 @ 1.86GHz with Intel GMA 950 graphics

Command ''(cd /var/lib/acpi-support/ ; grep . -r *-*)'' yields:

bios-version:F.25<<BR>>
system-manufacturer:Hewlett-Packard<<BR>>
system-product-name:HP Pavilion dv6000 (GH907EA#UUG)<<BR>>
system-version:Rev 1
